   sāmānyatvādeva /	sAmAnya tvAt eva /

   śabdārthadharmāṇāmeva sambhavati rasamātradharmāṇāmeva guṇānāṃ kathaṃ	Sabda arTa DarmANAm eva samBavati rasa mAtra DarmANAm eva guNAnAm kaTam
   taddvārakatvaṃ vyākhyātamityata āha   iheti /	tad dvAraka tvam vyAKyAtam iti atas Aha   iha iti /

   padaṃtenārthastena ca guṇo vyajyate, ityabhiprāyeṇa arthasya	padaMtena arTaH tena ca guNaH vyajyate, iti aBiprAyeNa arTasya
   guṇābhivyañjakatvamuktam /	guNa aBivyaQjaka tvam uktam /

   guṇānāṃ sākṣādrasopakārakatvenaiva kārikārthaḥ saṃgacchate iti bodhyam /	guNAnAm sAkzAt rasa upakAraka tvena eva kArikA arTaH saMgacCate iti boDyam /

   itthaṃ vākyaṃ dvidhā matam // VisSd_2.1 //	itTam vAkyam dviDA matam // VisSd _2.1 //

   uktaṃ ca tantravārtike  	uktam ca tantra vArtike

   uttamavṛddhena madhyamavṛddhamuddiśya "gāmānaya" ityukte taṃ	uttama vRdDena maDyama vRdDam uddiSya "gAmAnaya" iti ukte tam
   gavānayanapravṛttamupalabhya bālo 'sya vākyasya	gavAnayana pravRttam upalaBya bAlaH asya vAkyasya
   "sāsnādimatpiṇḍānayanamarthaḥ" iti prathamaṃ pratipadyate, anantaraṃ ca	"sAsnAdimad piNxa Anayanam arTaH" iti praTamam pratipadyate, anantaram ca
   "gāṃ badhāna" "aśvamānaya" ityādāvāvāpodvāpābhyāṃ gośabdasya	"gAm baDAna" "aSvamAnaya" iti AdO= AvApa udvApAByAm go Sabdasya
   "sāsnādimānarthaḥ" ānayanapadasya ca "āharaṇamarthaḥ" iti	"sA asnAdi mAnarTaH" Anayana padasya ca "AharaNam arTaH" iti
   saṃketamavadhārayati /	saMketam avaDArayati /

        guṇapadārthaṃ vivṛṇoti  guṇa iti /	guNa padArTam vivRNoti  guNaH iti /
        viśeṣādhānaheturiti jātervyavacchedaḥ /	viSeza ADAna hetuH iti jAteH vyavacCedaH /
        siddha iti kriyāyāḥ /	sidDaH iti kriyAyAH /
        guṇānāṃ viśeṣādhānahetutvopapattimāha  śuklādaya iti /	guNAnAm viSeza ADAna hetutva upapatti mAha   Sukla AdayaH iti /
        gavādikaṃ jātyā labdhagovyavahārayogyatākam /	gavA Adikam jAtyA labDa go vyavahAra yogya tAkam /
        dravyetyādi /	dravya ityAdi /
        hetuṃ vināpi ayaṃ ḍitthaḥ ḍavittha ityādirūpeṇaṃ śṛṅgagrāhikayā	hetum vinA api ayam xitTaH xavitTaH iti Adi rUpeNam SRFga grAhikayA
   vaktṛsaṃketena vyaktiṣu sānniveśitaḥ /	vaktR saMketena vyaktizu sAnniveSitaH /
        sajātīyaśūnye ḍitthādyarthopasthāpakaḥ śabdaḥ saṃketasya viṣaya iti /	sajAtIya SUnye xitTa Adi arTa upasTApakaH SabdaH saMketasya vizayaH iti /
        pūrvāparībhūtaḥ pradhānakriyāyā avayavarūpatayā kāryyakāraṇabhūtena	pUrva aparIBUtaH praDAna kriyAyAH avayava rUpa tayA kAryya kAraNa BUtena
   santānībhūtaḥ /	santAnIBUtaH /
        eṣveveti   eṣu jātyādiṣu /	ezu eva iti   ezu jAti Adizu /
        iha ca dravyasyopādhiviṣayatvāsambhave 'pi tatsaṃjñāyāḥ upādhitvena	iha ca dravyasya upADi vizaya tva asamBave api tad saMjQAyAH upADi tvena
   tattvamupacārāt /	tattvam upacArAt /
        ḍitthādyarthe cānantyavyabhicārābhāvāt upādhiṃ vinaiva sambhavati	xitTa Adi arTe ca Anantya vyaBicAra aBAvAt upADim vinA eva samBavati
   vācyavācakasambandhasamayagraha iti nopādhirapekṣyate /	vAcya vAcaka sambanDa samaya grahaH iti na upADiH apekzyate /

   punarātmāśrayadoṣaḥ /	punar Atma ASraya dozaH /

        ata eva guṇadravyakiyāsu ceti dravyakiyāsu ceti dravyasya	atas eva guNa dravya kiyAsu ca iti dravya kiyAsu ca iti dravyasya
   saṃketaviṣayatvamuktaṃ, tatrānantyavyabicāradoṣāpātābhāvāt /	saMketa vizaya tvam uktaM, tatra Ananti a vyabicAra doza apAta aBAvAt /

   rekhoparekhādisaṃsthānaviśeṣasya ca bhinnatvāt tatrāśakyaḥ sabhayagraha	reKA upareKA Adi saMsTAna viSezasya ca Binna tvAt tatra aSakyaH sa Baya graha
   iti /	iti /
        nanvevaṃ gavādipadena saṃketitatvāt jātāvantarhitāyāṃ kathaṃ	nanu evam gavA Adi padena saMketita tvAt jAtO= antarhitAyAm kaTam
   vyaktipratītiḥ /	vyakti pratItiH /
        avinābhāvasyānusandhānamantareṇākṣepakatvābhāvāt /	avinABO= asya anusanDAnam antareNa Akzepaka tva aBAvAt /

   cātrānupalabdhibādhitaṃ; tatrānupayogitayā vyakteḥ śabdabodhitatvaṃ vinā	ca atra anupalabDi bADitaM; tatra anupayogi tayA vyakteH Sabda boDita tvam vinA
   śābde 'nvaye praveśāsambhava iti jātyabhidhāyake śabde tadbonārthaṃ	SAbde anvaye praveSa asamBavaH iti jAti aBiDAyake Sabde tad bona arTam
   vyañjanaiva vṛttirūpāsitumuciteti rahasyam /	vyaQjanA eva vRtti rUpa asitum ucitA iti rahasyam /
        evaṃ ca jātimātrasaṅketapakṣe ca nirvivādam /	evam ca jAti mAtra saFketa pakze ca nirvivAdam /
        kiṃ ca saṃśayāpagamārtham upāttāni padāni saṃsargasya mukhyāṅgaṃ	kim ca saMSaya apagama arTam upAttAni padAni saMsargasya muKya aFgam
   saṃsṛjyamānaṃ vyaktirūpaṃ sākṣānna bodhayanti, bahiraṅgantu	saMsRjyamAnam vyakti rUpam sAkzAt na boDayanti, bahis aFgantu
   tadupādhibhūtaṃ sāmānyameva bodhayanti, ityasaṅgatam /	tad upADi BUtam sAmAnyam eva boDayanti, iti asaFgatam /
        ye tvāhuḥ, "vyaktisadhrīcīnāyāmeva jātau saṅketa'; iti tairapi	ye tu AhuH, "vyakti saDrIcInAyAm eva jAtO saFketa a; iti tEH api
   prakṛtasya lakṣaṇasyāsaṅketitatvāt saṅketitabhedānāmabhāvāt,	prakRtasya lakzaNasya asaFketita tvAt saFketita BedAnAm aBAvAt,
   prakṛtasaṃsargayogyavyaktipratītau śaktyantaramavaśyamabhyupeyam /	prakRta saMsarga yogya vyakti pratItO Sakti antaram avaSyam aByupeyam /
        sāmānyasya sarvaviśeṣatvāṅgīkārāt saṅketena sarvaviśeṣyajñāne tu	sAmAnyasya sarva viSeza tva aFgIkArAt saFketena sarva viSezya jQAne tu
   sarvasyāpi sarvajñatvāpattiḥ /	sarvasya api sarvajQatva ApattiH /

   atha lakṣaṇā  	aTa lakzaNA

        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:
        (vi, tha) lakṣyo lakṣaṇayā grāhyaḥ ityuktatvāllakṣaṇāyā	(vi, Ta) lakzyaH lakzaNayA grAhyaH iti ukta tvAt lakzaNAyAH 
   lakṣaṇamāha   mukhyārtheti /	lakzaNam Aha    muKya arTa iti /
        mukhyārthaḥ śakyārthaḥ, tatrāparapadārthasyānvayabādhe jñāte	muKya arTaH Sakya arTaH, tatra apara padArTasya anvaya bADe jQAte
   satītyarthaḥ /	sati iti arTaH /
        gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau mukhyārthasya gaṅgāyā abādhāt; kintu	gaFgAyAm GozaH iti AdO muKya arTasya gaFgAyAH abADAt; kintu
   aparapadārthasya ghoṣānvayasyaiva bādhāt /	apara padArTasya Goza anvayasya eva bADAt /
        tadyuktomukhyārthasambaddhaḥ anyo mukhyārthādanyaḥ /	tad yuktaH muKyA arTa sambadDaH anyaH muKya arTAt anyaH /
        yathā vṛtyā jñātayā iti śeṣaḥ /	yaTA vRtyA jQAtayA iti SezaH /
        na kevalaṃ mukhyārthabādhajñānādhīnaṃ tajjñānaṃ, api tu rūḍheḥ	na kevalam muKya arTa bADa jQAna aDInam tat jQAnaM, api tu rUXeH
   prayojanād vāpīti /	prayojanAt vApi iti /
           rūḍhiḥ bhūrikālaprayogaḥ /	   rUXiH BUri kAla prayogaH /
        tathā ca etattritayajñāpitayā yā vṛttyā mukhyārthādanyo	taTA ca etad tritayajQA pitayA yA vRttyA muKya arTAt anyaH 
   mukhyārthasambaddhor'thaḥ pratīyate asau śaktirvṛttirlakṣaṇetyarthaḥ /	muKya arTa sambadDoH aTaH pratIyate asO SaktiH vRttiH lakzaNA iti arTaH /
        sā cārpitā vaktṛpuruṣeṇa lakṣyārthaviṣayatayā janitetyarthaḥ, tathā	sA ca arpitA vaktR puruzeNa lakzya arTa vizaya tayA a janitA iti arTaH, taTA
   ca vaktṛtātparyyatmikaiva sā bodhyā /	ca vaktR tAt paryyatmikA eva sA boDyA /

   vārpitatvābhāvāt /	vA arpita tva aBAvAt /
        yā tu vyaṅgyārthe tātparyyakhyā vṛttirdhvanikenoktā yā ca	yA tu vyaFgya arTe tAtparyyaKyA vRttiH Dvanikena uktA yA ca
   padārthadvayasaṃsarge tātparyyākhyā vṛttiḥ prācīvanaiyāyikairuktā sā	padArTa dvaya saMsarge tAtparyya AKyA vRttiH prAcIva nEyAyikEH uktA sA
   naitāttritaya jñāpitā; ityato bhinnaiva sā /	na etAt tritaya  jQApitA; iti atas BinnA eva sA /
        mukhyārthe 'parapadārthānvayabodhe 'pi tātparyyaviṣayasya	muKya arTe apara padArTa anvaya boDe api tAtparyya vizayasya

   gacchanti kuntāḥ praviśantītyatra mukhyārthayoḥ chatrikuntayoḥ	gacCanti kuntAH praviSanti iti atra muKya arTayoH Catri kuntayoH
   gamanapraveśānvayasattve 'pi niruktamukhyārthabādhasattvānnāvyāptiḥ /	gamana praveSa anvaya sattve api nirukta muKya arTa bADa sattvAt na avyAptiH /

   "kaliṅgaḥ sāhasikaḥ" ityādau kaliṅgādiśabdo deśaviśeṣādirūpe svārthe /	"kaliFgaH sAhasikaH" ityAdO kaliFga Adi SabdaH deSa viSeza Adi rUpe sva arTe /

   "gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ" ityādau gaṅgādiśabdo jalamayādirūpārthavācakatvātprakṛte	"gaFgAyAm GozaH" ityAdO gaFgA Adi SabdaH jala maya Adi rUpa arTa vAcaka tvAt prakRte

        atra kaliṅgaḥ sāhasika iti na pāṭhaḥ /	atra kaliFgaH sAhasikaH iti na pAWaH /

        sādhyavasānālakṣaṇāyā udāharaṇaprasaṅge vyaktirbhāviṣyatītyarthaḥ /	sADyavasAna alakzaNAyAH udAharaNa prasaFge vyaktiH BAvizyati iti arTaH /
        ubhayatraiva mukhyārthaṃ kaliṅgarūpaṃ deśaṃ pravāharūpāṃ saṅgā ca	uBayatra eva muKya arTam kaliFga rUpam deSam pravAha rUpAm saFgA ca
   vihāya taddeśasthapuruṣatattīrayoḥ parayoranvayaprabodhāya	vihAya tad deSa sTa puruza tad tIrayoH parayoH anvaya praboDAya
   puruṣatari rūpa mātra viṣayatā lakṣaṇāyāḥ /	puruza tari  rUpa  mAtra  vizaya tA lakzaNAyAH /
        taddarśayati   anayorheti /	tad darSa yati   anayoH ha iti /
        vākyārtha bodhye puruṣataṭayoranvayasiddhaye ityanvayaḥ /	vAkya arTa boDye puruza tawayoH anvaya sidDaye iti anvayaH /
        samarpayata ityatra paramātra iti śeṣaḥ /	samarpayate iti atra para mAtra iti SezaH /
        paramātraṃ    viṣayīkuruta ityarthaḥ /	para mAtram    vizayIkurutaH iti arTaH /
        kaliṅgagaṅgāśabdau ityatra kaliṅgagaṅgāśabādapadaṃ	kaliFga gaFgA SabdO iti atra kaliFga gaFgA SabAda padam
   tanniṣṭhalakṣaṇādvayaparaṃ yathā vyākhyātārthanusāreṇa bodhyam /	tad nizWa lakzaNA dvaya param yaTA vyAKyAta arTa nu sAreNa boDyam /
        evamuttaratrapi vyākhyeyam /	evam uttaratrapi vyAKyeyam /
        Locanā:	LocanA:
        (lo, a) arpaṇaṃ svasya gaṅgādeḥ /	(lo, a) arpaNam svasya gaFgA AdeH /

        ************* COMMENTARY *************	************* SOMMENTa aRY *************
        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:
        (vi, śa) itthaṃ sāropāmuktvā "nigīrṇṇasya matā sādhyavasānikā'; iti	(vi, Sa) itTam sAra upAmuktvA "nigIrNNasya matA sADyavasAnikA a; iti
   kārikāñcalaṃ vyācaṣṭe nigīrṇṇasya punariti /	kArikA aQcalam vyAcazwe  nigIrNNasya punar iti /
        asyāścaturṣviti rūḍhiprayojanadvaye upādānalakṣaṇādvayaṃ taddvaye	asyAH caturzu iti rUXi prayojana dvaye upAdAna lakzaNAH dvayam tad dvaye
   lakṣaṇalakṣaṇādvayaṃ ceti sādhyavasānāyaścatvārobhedāḥ /	lakzaNa lakzaNAdvayam ca iti sADyavasAnAyaH catvAraH BedAH /
        pūrvodāharaṇānyeveti rūḍhāvupādānalakṣaṇāyāḥ   "śveto dhāvati'; iti	pUrva udAharaNAni eva iti rUXO= upAdAna lakzaNAyAH   "Svetas DAvati a; iti
   prayojane upādānalakṣaṇāyāḥ "kuntāḥ praviśanti'; iti yaddvayamudāhṛtaṃ	prayojane upAdAna lakzaNAyAH "kuntAH praviSanti a; iti yat dvayam udAhRtam
   rūḍhau lakṣaṇalakṣaṇāyāḥ "kaliṅgaḥ sāhasaṃ karoti'; iti prayojane	rUXO lakzaNa lakzaNAyAH "kaliFgaH sAhasam karoti a; iti prayojane
   lakṣaṇalakṣaṇāyāṃ tu rājakīye puruṣe gacchati "rājāsau gacchati'; iti	lakzaNa lakzaNAyAm tu rAjakIye puruze gacCati "rAjA asO gacCati a; iti
   yadudāhṛtaṃ tatra idaṃ padatyāgena udāharaṇamityata etāni catvāri	yat udAhRtam tatra idam pada tyAgena udAharaNam iti atas etAni catvAri
   sādhyavasānāyā udāharaṇānītyarthaḥ /	sADyavasAnAyAH udAharaNAni iti arTaH /
        rājā gacchatītyatra rājavat paricārakaveṣṭitatvaṃ prayojanam /	rAjA gacCati iti atra rAja vat paricAraka vezwita tvam prayojanam /
        eteṣu caturṣu hi kartryā khyātenaiva kartṛlakṣyārthasya upasthāpanāt	etezu caturzu hi kartryA KyAtena eva kartR lakzya arTasya upasTApanAt 
   nāmapadena tu anupasthānānnigīrṇṇatā /	nAma padena tu anupasTAnAt nigIrNNa tA /
        tasmiṃśca prathamaṃ śakyārthatādamyāropāt sādhyavasānatvamiti bodhyam	tasmin= ca praTamam Sakya arTa tAdami AropAt sADyavasAna tvam iti boDyam
        prathamāntoktakārake prathamāntapadārthasyābhedānvayatyutpatteḥ /	praTama anta ukta kArake praTama anta padArTasya aBeda anvayati utpatteH /
        gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa iti tu lakṣaṇalakṣaṇodāharaṇaṃ yaddarśetaṃ tattu na	gaFgAyAm GozaH iti tu lakzaNa lakzaNa udAharaNam yat darSetam tat tu na
   sādhyavasānodāharaṇam /	sADyavasAna udAharaNam /
        tatra lakṣyārthe tīre pravāhatādātmyānāropāt /	tatra lakzya arTe tIre pravAha tAdAtmya an AropAt /
        evaṃ ca rūḍhau lakṣaṇalakṣaṇedāharaṇaṃ kaliṅga ityādikaṃ yaduktaṃ	evam ca rUXO lakzaNa lakzaNet AharaNam kaliFgaH iti Adikam yat uktam
   tatra sāhasika iti prāmādikaḥ pāṭhaḥ /	tatra sAhasikaH iti prAmAdikaH pAWaH /
        nāmapadena sāhasika ityanena lakṣyārthasya puruṣasyopādānāt	nAma padena sAhasikaH iti anena lakzya arTasya puruzasya upAdAnAt
   sāropatvena sādhyavasānatvābhāvāt /	sAra upatvena sADya vasAna tva aBAvAt /
        kintu kaliṅgaḥ sāhasaṃ karoti ityeva tatra pāṭhaḥ /	kintu kaliFgaH sAhasam karoti iti eva tatra pAWaH /
        itthamupādānalakṣaṇālakṣaṇalakṣaṇayoḥ rūḍhiprayojanahetukatvena	itTam upAdAna lakzaNa alakzaNa lakzaNayoH rUXi prayojana hetuka tvena
   caturvidhayoḥ sāropāsādhyavasānikārūpatvena dvaiguṇyāt aṣṭavidhatvam /	caturviDayoH sAra upAsADyavasAnikA rUpatvena dvEguNyAt azwaviDa tvam /
        Locanā:	LocanA:
        (lo, u) evamārope rūḍhiprayojanayorudāharaṇe catuṣṭayaṃ darśayitvā	(lo, u) evam Arope rUXi prayojanayoH udAharaNe catuzwayam darSayitvA

   sādṛśyetarasaṃbandhāḥ śuddhāstāḥ sakalā api // VisSd_2.9 //	sAdRSya itara saMbanDAH SudDAH tAH sakalAH api // VisSd _2.9 //

   diṅmātraṃ yathā  	diS mAtram yaTA  
   "strigdhaśyāmalakāntiliptaviyato velladvalākā ghanā vātāḥ śīkariṇaḥ	"H trigDaSyAmala kAnti lipta viyataH vellat valAkAH GanAH vAtAH SIkariNaH
   payodasuhṛdāmānandakekāḥ kalāḥ /	payoda suhRdAm Ananda kekAH kalAH /
   kāmaṃ santu dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhorahṛdayo rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ sahe vaidehī tu kathaṃ	kAmam santu dRXam kaWora hRdayaH rAmaH asmi sarvam sahe vEdehI tu kaTam

   smaraṇamiti /	smaraNam iti /

        (lo, ṛ) uktaṃ hi bhartṛhariṇā iti śeṣaḥ /	(lo, R) uktam hi BartR hariNAH iti SezaH /

   "saśaṅkhcakro hariḥ" iti śaṅkhcakrayogena hariśabdo viṣṇumevābhidhatte /	"sa SaFKcakraH hariH" iti SaFKcakra yogena hari SabdaH vizNum eva aBiDatte /
   "aśaṅkhacakro hariḥ" iti tadviyogena tameva /	"a SaFKa cakraH hariH" iti tad viyogena tam eva /
   "bhīmārjunau" iti arjunaḥ pārthaḥ /	"BIma arjunO" iti arjunaH pArTaH /
   "karṇārjunau" iti karṇaḥ sūtaputraḥ /	"karNa arjunO" iti karNaH sUtaputraH /
   "sthāṇuṃ vande" iti sthāṇuḥ śivaḥ /	"sTANum vande" iti sTANuH SivaH /
   "sarvaṃ jānāti devaḥ" iti devo bhavān /	"sarvam jAnAti devaH" iti devaH BavAn /
   "kupito makaradhvajaḥ" iti makaradhvajaḥ kāmaḥ /	"kupitaH makaraDvajaH" iti makaraDvajaH kAmaH /
   "devaḥ purāriḥ" iti purāriḥ śivaḥ /	"devaH purAriH" iti purAriH SivaH /
   "madhunā mattaḥ pikaḥ" iti madhurvasantaḥ /	"maDunA mattaH pikaH" iti maDurvasantaH /
   "yātu vo dayitāmukham" iti mukhaṃ sāṃmukhyam /	"yAtu vaH dayitA muKam" iti muKam sAMmuKyam /
   "vibhāti gagane candraḥ, iti candraḥ śaśī /	"viBAti gagane candraH, iti candraH SaSI /
   "niśi citrabhānuḥ" iti citrabhānurvāhniḥ /	"niSi citraBAnuH" iti citraBAnuH vAhniH /
   "bhāti rathāṅgam" rathāṅgam" iti napuṃsakavyaktyā rathāṅgaṃ cakram /	"BAti raTAFgam" raTAFgam" iti napuMsaka vyaktyA raTAFgam cakram /
   svarastu veda eva viśeṣapratītikṛnna kāvya iti tasya viṣayo nodāhṛtaḥ /	svaraH tu vedaH eva viSeza pratIti kRt na kAvyaH iti tasya vizayaH na udAhRtaH /

   upabhuktāmāgatyāsau matprārthanayāpi nāyāta iti pratārayantīṃ dūtīṃ prati	upaBuktAm Agatya asO mad prArTanayA api na AyAtaH iti pratArayantIm dUtIm prati
   nāyikāyāḥ solluṇṭhanoktiriyam /	nAyikAyAH sa ulluNWana uktiH iyam /
        he matprārthanayāpi nāyāta iti mithyāvādini ! dūti ! bāndhavajanasya	he mad prArTanayA api na AyAtaH iti miTyA vAdini ! dUti ! bAnDava janasya
   mama ajñātakāmapīḍāgame itaḥ strātuṃ vāpīṃ gatāsi na	mama ajQAta kAma pIxA game itas strAtum vApIm gatA asi na
   punastasyādhamasyāntikaṃ gatāsi /	punar tasya aDamasya antikam gatA asi /

        āpātataḥ strānakāryyāṇi darśayati   niḥ śeṣeti /	ApAtatas strAnakAryyANi darSayati   niH Seza iti /

        adharaśca nirmṛṣṭarāgaḥ /	aDaraH ca nirmRzwa rAgaH /
        netre ca dūramatiśayaṃ yathā syāttathānañjane jāte iti śeṣaḥ /	netre ca dUram atiSayam yaTA syAt taTA anaQjane jAte iti SezaH /
        tat kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ ca dūramiti /	tat kriyA viSezaNam ca dUram iti /
        tathā iyaṃ tanvī kṛśā tava tanuḥ pulakitā; strānaśaityāt jātapulakā	taTA iyam tanvI kRSA tava tanuH pulakitA; strAnaSEtyAt jAta pulakA
   ityarthaḥ /	iti arTaH /
        tatheti viśeṣaṇasamuccaye /	taTA iti viSezaNa samuccaye /

        Locanā:	LocanA:
        (lo, ṛ) śabdabodhya ityarthāntaramapekṣate,	(lo, R) Sabda boDyaH iti arTa antaram apekzate,

        kintu yatra yacchaktirutkaṭā tatra tanmūlo vyañjakatvavyapadeśaḥ /	kintu yatra yad SaktiH utkawA tatra tad mUlaH vyaQjaka tva vyapadeSaH /
        ********** END OF COMMENTARY **********	********** END OF SOMMENTa aRY **********
   yataḥ śabdo vyañjakatve 'pyarthāntaramapekṣate, artho 'pi śabdam,	yatas SabdaH vyaQjaka tve api arTa antaram apekzate, arTaH api Sabdam,
   tadekasya vyañjakatve 'nyasya sahakāritāvaśyamaṅgīkartavyā /	tat ekasya vyaQjaka tve anyasya saha kArita avaSyam aFgIkartavyA /

   pariṇāmavaśādratyādyabhinnatvena viśiṣṭa āsvādyate ityarthaḥ /	pariNAma vaSa at rati Adi aBinna tvena viSizwaH AsvAdyate iti arTaH /

   yaḥ svaprakāśa āsvādaḥ tasyeva rasatvāt tatra cābhinnatvābhāvāt /	yaH sva prakASaH AsvAdaH tasya iva rasa tvAt tatra ca aBinna tva aBAvAt /

   atra hi mama pariṇotānnācchādanādidātṛtayā svāmyeva na tu vallabhaḥ /	atra hi mama pariNotAnna AcCAdana Adi dAtR tayA svAmi eva na tu vallaBaH /

   atha dhairyam  	aTa DEryam

   yathā  jvalatu gagane rātrau rātrāvakhaṇḍakalaḥ śaśī, dahatu madanaḥ,	yaTA  jvalatu gagane rAtrO rAtrO= aKaNxa kalaH SaSI, dahatu madanaH,
   kiṃvā mṛtyoḥ pareṇa vidhāsyati /	kiMvA mRtyoH pareNa viDAsyati /
   mama tu dayitaḥ ślāghyastāto jananyamalānvayā kulamamalinaṃ na tvevāyaṃ	mama tu dayitaH SlAGyaH tAtaH jananI amala anvayA kulam amalinam na tu eva ayam
   jano na ca jīvitam" //	janaH na ca jIvitam" //
        ************* COMMENTARY *************	************* SOMMENTa aRY *************
        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:
        (vi, ra) muktātmaślāghaneti   acañcalā manovṛttiryā muktātmaślāghanā	(vi, ra) mukta Atma SlAGana iti   a caQcalA manaH vRttiH yA mukta Atma SlAGanA
   sā dhairyyamiti bhāvaḥ /	sA DEryyam iti BAvaH /
        jvalatu iti gaurikāvivāhe udvejamānāyāstatra saṃmitāyāḥ mālatyā	jvalatu iti gOrikA vivAhe udvejamAnAyAH tatra saMmitAyAH mAlatyA
   uktiriyam /	uktiH iyam /
        mama virahoddīpanāya rātrau akhaṇḍakalaḥ śaśī jvalatu /	mama viraha uddIpanAya rAtrO aKaNxa kalaH SaSI jvalatu /
        madano 'pi māṃ dahatu /	madanaH api mAm dahatu /
        mṛtyoḥ pareṇa karmaṇā kiṃvā tena vidhāsyate /	mRtyoH pareNa karmaNA kiMvA tena viDAsyate /
        varaṃ mṛtyureva vidhīyate; tathāpi pitṛmātṛkulakalaṅkaṃ na	varam mRtyuH eva viDIyate; taTA api pitR mAtR kula kalaFkam na
   janayiṣyāmi ityabhiprāyeṇāha   mama tviti /	janayizyAmi iti aBiprAyeNa aha   mama tu iti /
        atastu mayi mama dayitaḥ drayāyogyo yataḥ khlāghyaḥ niṣkalaṅkaḥ /	atas tu mayi mama dayitaH draya ayogyaH yatas KlAGyaH nizkalaFkaH /
        atastatkalaṅkaṃ na janayiṣyāmītyarthaḥ /	atas tad kalaFkam na janayizyAmi iti arTaH /
        evamamalānvayā mama jananyapi dayitetyarthaḥ /	evam amala anvayAH mama jananI api dayitA iti arTaH /
        natvevāyaṃ jano mādhavaḥ dayito jīvitañca na dayitamityarthaḥ /	natu eva ayam janaH mADavaH dayitaH jIvi taQca na dayitam iti arTaH /

   yathā  	yaTA  
   "mā garvamudvaha kapolatale cakāsti kāntasvahastalikhitā mama mañjarīti /	"mA garvam udvaha kapola tale cakAsti kAnta sva hasta liKitA mama maQjarI iti /
   anyāpi kiṃ na khalu bhājanamīdṛśīnāṃ vairī na cedbhavati	anyA api kim na Kalu BAjanam IdRSInAm vErI na ced Bavati
   vepathurantarāyaḥ" //	vepaTuH antarAyaH" //
        ************* COMMENTARY *************	************* SOMMENTa aRY *************
        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:
        (vi, ga) mado vikāra iti /	(vi, ga) madaH vikAraH iti /
        avalepo garvaḥ /	avalepaH garvaH /
        mā garvamiti  anyanāyikāyāḥ patisaubhagyādhīnagarvaṃ sūcayantyāḥ	mA garvam iti  anya nAyikAyAH pati sOBagya aDIna garvam sUcayantyAH
   tatsakhyāḥ tat sapatnyāmuktiriyam /	tad saKyAH tat sapatnyAm uktiH iyam /
        he sākhi ! mama kapolatale kāntasvahastalikhitā mañjarī puṣpakalikā	he sAKi ! mama kapola tale kAnta sva hasta liKitA maQjarI puzpakalikA
   cakāsti śobhate iti garva mā udvahaṃ /	cakAsti SoBate iti garva mA udvaham /
        kathamityata āha  anyāpīti /	kaTam iti atas Aha  anyApi iti /
        anyā tava sapatnī mama sakhī kiṃ kapole tanna likhatītyatrāha /	anyA tava sapatnI mama saKI kim kapole tat na liKati iti atra Aha /
        vairīti  vepathuratra mañjarīlikhanādhikāraṇamalābho nāyikāyā eva	vErI iti  vepaTuH atra maQjarIliKana aDikAraNam alABaH nAyikAyAH eva
   patyurbhāvātiśayadarśanena bhāvodayāt  natu lekhakasya patyuḥ pāṇeḥ, tasya	patyuH BAva atiSaya darSanena BAva udayAt  natu leKakasya patyuH pANeH, tasya

   ātmīyāṃ matimāsthāya sthitimatra vidhehi tat" //	AtmIyAm matim AsTAya sTitim atra viDehi tat" //
   atra pratipādyasya saṃmukhīnatvādeva labdhe pratipādyatve tvāmiti	atra pratipAdyasya saMmuKIna tvAt eva labDe pratipAdya tve tvAm iti

        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:

   iti kulaveṇudvayārthakasya vaṃśapadasya prakaraṇāt kule niyantraṇena veṇo	iti kula veNu dvaya arTakasya vaMSapadasya prakaraNAt kule niyantraNena veNaH 
   stad vyaṅgyatvena tadrūpaṇasyāpi vyaṅgyatvāt davānalatvāropasiddhyaṅgamiti	stat vyaFgya tvena tad rUpaNasya api vyaFgya tvAt dava anala tva Ara upasidDi aFgam iti
   kule davā nalavādhena veṇāveda tad bādhāt /	kule davA nala vADena veNa aveda tat bADAt /
        atredamavadheyam /	atra idam avaDeyam /
        yadi prakaraṇavaśāt anekārthasya vaṃśapadasya prathamaṃ	yadi prakaraNa vaSAt aneka arTasya vaMSapadasya praTamam
   kulabodhakatvam; tadaiva veṇurūpor'tho vyaṅgyo bhavati tadeva tu na;	kula boDaka tvam; tadA eva veNu rUpor aTo vyaFgyaH Bavati tat eva tu na;
   davānalasya kule bhādhāt /	dava analasya kule BADAt /

   rāhurupaṇakāraṇamiti /	rAhuH upaNa kAraNam iti /

   vācyasiddhyaṅgodāharaṇam /	vAcya sidDi aFga udAharaNam /

   vācyasiddhyaṅgatvamanyasya paramparitarūpakatvamityatravinigamakaṃ nāsti /	vAcya sidDi aFga tvam anyasya paramparita rUpaka tvam iti atra vinigamakam na asti /

   dhairyyacyutarahita ityevaṃvidhāyāḥ bhaṅgyāḥ pratītyaiva siddhayati /	DEryya cyuta rahitaH iti evaMviDAyAH BaFgyAH pratItya eva sidDayati /

   śarīrasādam /	SarIra sAdam /

        "ityatra viśeṣajale rūpetaṃ halāhalaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ	"iti atra viSeza jale rUpetam halAhalam vyaFgyam

   veṇustu aprākaraṇiko vyaṅgya eveti vācyam /	veNuH tu aprAkaraNikaH vyaFgyaH eva iti vAcyam /
        davānalarūpaṇasyāpi tātparyyaviṣayatvena tasya kule bādhena	dava anala rUpaNasya api tAtparyya vizaya tvena tasya kule bADena

   garbhasandhiḥ /	garBa sanDiH /

   vimarṣasandhiḥ /	vimarza sanDiH /
        bījavatāṃ prakīrṇanāṃsakalasandhyuktārthānāmekārthatāprāpaṇaṃ	bIjavatAm prakIrNa nAMsakala sanDi ukta arTAnAm ekArTa tA prApaNam
   nirvahaṇasandhiḥ /	nirvahaNa sanDiH /
        ayamupasaṃhṛtisandhirityucyate /	ayam upasaMhRti sanDiH iti ucyate /
        ete pañca sandhayaḥ /	ete paQca sanDayaH /
        mahāsahāyamati /	mahAsahAyam ati /
        rāmādeḥ sugrīvādayo mahāsahāyāḥ /	rAma AdeH sugrIva AdayaH mahA sahAyAH /
        nāyakaḥ pradhānapātram /	nAyakaH praDAna pAtram /

   svarūpamāha   pratyakṣeti /	svarUpam Aha    pratyakzA iti /
        pratyakṣanetreti /	pratyakza netra iti /
        aṅka iti kīrttita ityagrenvayaḥ /	aFkaH iti kIrttitaH iti agrenu ayaH /
        netā nāyakaḥ, taccaritaṃ pratyakṣaṃ yatra tādṛśaḥ /	netA nAyakaH, tat caritam pratyakzam yatra tAdRSaH /
        rasabhāveti /	rasa BAva iti /
        bhāvo nāyakanāyakayorākūtam /	BAvaH nAyaka nAyakayoH AkUtam /
        kṣudracūrṇakamadīrghasamāsaṃ saṃskṛtam /	kzudra cUrNa kama dIrGa samAsam saMskRtam /
        vicchinneti /	vicCinnA iti /
        vyāpakaprasaṅgasya evadeśarūpor'tho vicchinnasamāpito yatra tādṛśaḥ /	vyApaka prasaFgasya eva deSa rUpor aTo vicCinna samApitaH yatra tAdRSaH /
        kiñcitsaṃsagnabinduka iti /	kiQcid saMsagna bindukaH iti /

   bindusaṃjñakam /	bindu saMjQakam /

        kiñcittadvān ityarthaḥ /	kiQcid tadvAn iti arTaH /

   yat, sadasi niviḍacetyavrahmaghoṣaiḥ purustāt /	yat, sadasi nivixa ceti avrahma GozEH puruH tAt /

   saṃśayo 'jñātatattvasya vākye syādyadaniścayaḥ /	saMSayaH ajQAta tattvasya vAkye syAt yat aniScayaH /

        atreti na ca ghadhātornānārthatvena dāne grahaṇe 'pi śaktirastyeva,	atra iti na ca GaDAtoH nAna arTa tvena dAne grahaNe api SaktiH asti eva,
   āṅupasargeṇa tu dānabodhapratibandha evetyataḥ śakyārthe kathaṃ	AFupasargeNa tu dAna boDa pratibanDaH eva iti atas Sakya arTe kaTam
   śaktibhrama iti vācyam /	Sakti BramaH iti vAcyam /

   āḍupasargarahitasyaiva dāñaḥ dāne śaktirityasyaiva yuktatvāt /	Axupasarga rahitasya eva dAQaH dAne SaktiH iti asya eva yukta tvAt /

        neyārthe tu bhramabījābhāvāt na bhrama iti viśeṣaḥ /	neya arTe tu Brama bIja aBAvAt na BramaH iti viSezaH /

   viśeṣaṇādānādasāṅkaryam /	viSezaNa AdAnAt asa aFkaryam /
        avācake ca śaktibhramāt vivakṣitārthe tātparyasattvāt tātparyarūpāyā	avAcake ca Sakti BramAt vivakzita arTe tAtparyasattvAt tAtparyarUpAyAH 
   lakṣaṇāyā vivakṣitārthatvabodhakatvamastyeva iti /	lakzaNAyAH vivakzita arTa tva boDaka tvam asti eva iti /

        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:
        (vi, la) amuktetyatra tviti /	(vi, la) amuktA iti atra tu iti /
        abhojītyatra samāsasthakartranvayaḥ /	aBoji iti atra samAsasTa kartR anvayaH /

        na pacati na nidrāti ityanvaye kartturupasthāne 'pi	na pacati na nidrAti iti anvaye karttuH upasTAne api

        tādṛśatātparyyasya eva tatrābhāvāt /	tAdRSatAtparyyasyaH eva tatra aBAvAt /
        śrāddhābhojanaśīlānvaye tu śrāddhabhojanaśīlabhinna iti pratītau na	SrAdDa aBojana SIla anvaye tu SrAdDa Bojana SIla BinnaH iti pratItO na
   kadacit bhojanakṛt api pratīyate ityato granthakṛtānavadhānādeva itthaṃ	kadacid Bojana kRt api pratIyate iti atas granTa kRtAnavaDAnAt eva itTam
   samādhānaṃ kṛtam /	samADAnam kRtam /

   "yā jayaśrīrmanojasya yayā jagadalaṅkṛtam /	"yAH jaya SrIH manojasya yayA jagat alaFkRtam /
   yāmeṇākṣīṃ vinā prāṇā viphalā me kuto 'dya sā" //	yAmeNa akzIm vinA prANAH viPalA me kutas adya sA" //
   atra yacchabdaniddiṣṭanāṃ vākyānāṃ parasparanirapekṣatvāt tadekāntaḥ	atra yat Sabda niddizwanAm vAkyAnAm paraspara nirapekza tvAt tad ekAntaH
   pātinā eṇākṣīśabdena anyeṣāṃ sambandhaḥ kaverabhimato nopapadyata eva /	pAtinA eNAkzI Sabdena anyezAm sambanDaH kaveH aBimataH na upapadyate eva /

        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:

   akramatā yathā   	akramatA yaTA   
   samaya eva karoti bālabalaṃ praṇigadanta itīva śarīriṇām /	samayaH eva karoti bAla balam praNigadante iti iva SarIriNAm /
   śaradi haṃsaravāḥ paruṣīkṛtāḥ svaramayūramayūrayaṇīyatām //	Saradi haMsa ravAH paruzIkRtAH svara mayUra mayUrayaNIyatAm //

   "praṇigadanta" ityanantaram /	"praNigadanta" iti anantaram /
   evam     	evam

   "dvayaṃ gataṃ saṃprati śocanīyatāṃ samāgamaprārthanayā kapālinaḥ /	"dvayam gatam saMprati SocanIya tAm samAgama prArTanayA kapAlinaH /

        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:
        (vi, ña) dūyaṃ gataṃ samprati śocanīyatāmiti   tapasyantīṃ pārvatīṃ	(vi, Qa) dUyam gatam samprati SocanIya tAm iti    tapasyantIm pArvatIm

   dvayamiti /	dvayam iti /

   tatsamāgamādanumeyā /	tad samAgamAt anumeyAH /

   amataparārthatā yathā   	amata para arTa tA yaTA

   atra śṛṅgārasasya vyañjako dvitīyor'thaḥ prakṛtarasavirodhitvādaniṣṭaḥ /	atra SRFgArasasya vyaQjakaH dvitIyor aTaH prakRta rasa viroDi tvAt anizwaH /

        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:

   prakṛtarasavirodharasavyañjakatvenānucitaḥ yatra tādṛśaṃ vākyamityarthaḥ /	prakRta rasa viroDa rasa vyaQjaka tvena anucitaH yatra tAdRSam vAkyam iti arTaH /
        rāmamanmatheti  sā niśācarī rākṣasī tāḍakā eva niśācarī abhisārikā	rAmamanmaTA iti  sA niSAcarI rAkzasI tAxakA eva niSAcarI aBisArikA
   rāmasya eva manmathasya kandarpasyaiva duḥ sahena śareṇa hṛdaye tāḍitā	rAmasya eva manmaTasya kandarpasya eva duH sahena SareNa hRdaye tAxitA
   satī durgandhavad rudhiraṇaiva gandhadravyayuktaraktacandanaiva ukṣitā	satI durganDa vat ruDiraNA eva ganDa dravya yukta raktacandanA eva ukzitA
   jīviteśasya yamasyaiva jīviteśasya prāṇeśasya upanāyakasya vasatiṃ gatā	jIvita ISasya yamasya eva jIvita ISasya prANeSasya upanAyakasya vasatim gatA
   ityarthaḥ /	iti arTaH /

   vācyasyānibhidhānaṃ yathā   	vAcyasya aniBiDAnam yaTA

   atra vyatikramalavamapītyaparivaśyaṃ vaktatryo noktaḥ /	atra vyatikrama lavam apItya parivaSyam vaktatryaH na uktaH /

        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:

   tasyoccāraṇenādhyāhāreṇa ca anabhidhānamityarthaḥ /	tasya uccAraNena aDyAhAreNa ca anaBiDAnam iti arTaH /
        nyūnapade tu adhyāhāreṇābhidhānamiti bhedo vakṣyate /	nyUna pade tu aDyAhAreNa aBiDAnam iti BedaH vakzyate /

   kathamapīti vācyamityarthaḥ /	kaTam api iti vAcyam iti arTaH /

   bhagnaprakramatā yathā   	Bagna prakramatA yaTA   
   "etamukto mantrimukhyaiḥ rāvaṇaḥ pratyabhāṣata" /	"etam uktaH mantri muKyEH rAvaNaH pratyaBAzata" /
   atra vacadhātunā prakrāntaṃ prativacanamapi tenaiva vaktumucitam /	atra vaca DAtunA prakrAntam prativacanam api tena eva vaktum ucitam /
   tena "rāvaṇaḥ pratyavocata" iti pāṭho yuktaḥ /	tena "rAvaNaH pratyavocata" iti pAWaH yuktaH /
   evaṃ ca sati na kathitapadatvadoṣaḥ, tasyoddeśyavyatiriktaviṣayakatvāt /	evam ca sati na kaTita pada tva dozaH, tasya uddeSya vyatirikta vizayaka tvAt /
   iha hi vacanaprativacanayoruddeśyapratinirdeśatvam /	iha hi vacana prativacanayoH uddeSya pratinirdeSa tvam /
        ************* COMMENTARY *************	************* SOMMENTa aRY *************
        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:
        (vi, ṇa) bhagnaprakramateti   prathamopakrāntarūpeṇākāṅkṣitaṃ yādṛśaṃ	(vi, Na) Bagna prakrama tA iti    praTama upakrAnta rUpeNa AkAFkzitam yAdRSam
   rūpaṃ tādṛśarūpeṇānuktiḥ tattvam /	rUpam tAdRSa rUpeNa anuktiH tattvam /
        evamukta iti  spaṣṭam /	evam uktaH iti  spazwam /
        atra vacdhātunā uddeśye prativacane 'pi vacdhātunāpi ākāṅkṣā iti	atra vacDAtunA uddeSye prativacane api vacDAtunA api AkAFkzAH iti
   darśayati   pratyavocateti /	darSayati    pratyavocata iti /
        tathā ca kathitapadatvadoṣaprasaktiṃ	taTA ca kaTita padatva doza prasaktim
   nirasyatievamiti   tasyoddeśyeti  uddeśye pratinirdeśyatā anekavidhāḥ	nirasyati evam iti   tasya uddeSya iti  uddeSye pratinirdeSyatAH anekaviDAH
   tatra vidhyatayā nirdeśyasya dharmasyaiva punarvidheyatayā ākāṅkṣitasya	tatra viDyatayA nirdeSyasya Darmasya eva punar viDeya tayA AkAFkzitasya
   pratinirdeśaḥ /	pratinirdeSaH /
        yathatraiva śloke rāvaṇe vidheyatayā nirdiṣṭasya vacanasya	yaTatra eva Sloke rAvaNe viDeya tayA nirdizwasya vacanasya
   prativacanatvena vidheyatayā pratinirdeśaḥ /	prativacana tvena viDeya tayA pratinirdeSaH /
        yathā vā    udeti savitā tāmrastāmra evāstameti ca /	yaTA vA   udeti savitA tAmraH tAmraH eva astam eti ca /
        sampattau ca vipattau mahatāmekarūpatā //	sampattO ca vipattO mahatAm eka rUpa tA //
        ityatra ekarūpatākathanād udyatsavitari vidheyatayā nirdiṣṭasya	iti atra eka rUpa tA kaTanAt udyat savitari viDeya tayA nirdizwasya
   tāmratvasya astasavitaryyapi vidhayatayā pratinirdeśaḥ /	tAmra tvasya astasavitaryi api viDayatayA pratinirdeSaH /
        (2) ekoddeśena vidhyasya vidheyāntare uddeśyatayā pratinirdeśa	(2) eka uddeSena viDyasya viDeya antare uddeSya tayA pratinirdeSa
   ityaparā /	iti aparAH /
        yathā   "jitendriyatvaṃ vinayasya kāraṇaṃ guṇaprakarṣo	yaTA   "jita indriya tvam vinayasya kAraNam guNa prakarzaH 
   vinayādavāpyate'; ityatra jitendriyatvena vidheyasya vinayakāraṇatvasya	vinayAt avApyate a; iti atra jita indriya tvena viDeyasya vinaya kAraNa tvasya
   śarīrapraviṣṭatayā vidheyasya vinayasya guṇaprakarṣavidhau uddeśyatayā	SarIra pravizwa tayA viDeyasya vinayasya guNa prakarza viDO uddeSya tayA
   pratinirdeśaḥ /	pratinirdeSaH /
        (3) ekavidhau uddiṣṭasya vidheyāntare 'pyudesyatayā pratinirdeśa	(3) eka viDO uddizwasya viDeya antare api udesya tayA pratinirdeSa
   ityaparā /	iti aparAH /
        yathā  te himālayamāmantrya punaḥ prekṣya ca śūlinam /	yaTA  te himAlayam Amantrya punar prekzya ca SUlinam /
        siddhaṃ cāsmainivedyārthaṃ tadvisṛṣṭāḥ khamudyayuḥ /	sidDam ca asmEnivedya arTam tad visRzwAH Kam udyayuH /
        ityatra siddhārthanivedanavidhau uddiṣṭasya tatraiva vidheye	iti atra sidDArTa nivedana viDO uddizwasya tatra eva viDeye
   uddeśyatayā punaḥ pratinirdeśa ityaparā /	uddeSya tayA punar pratinirdeSaH iti aparAH /
        etadudāharaṇaṃ ca   yaśo 'dhigantum ityādikaṃ darśayiṣyate /	etat udAharaNam ca   yaSaH aDigantum iti Adikam darSayizyate /
        tacca tatraiva darśayiṣyāmi /	tat ca tatra eva darSayizyAmi /
        Locanā:	LocanA:
        (lo, ṝ) tenaiva vaktumucitaṃ natu bhāṣidhātunā /	(lo, L) tena eva vaktum ucitam na tu BAzi DAtunA /

   "acalā abalā vā syuḥ sevyā brūta manīṣiṇaḥ ?" /	"acalAH abalA vA syuH sevyAH brUta manIziNaH ?" /

   "aisasya dhanuṣo bhaṅgaṃ kṣatttrasya ca samunnatim /	"Esasya DanuzaH BaFgam kzatttrasya ca samunnatim /

   samāptātā tattvam /	samAptAtA tattvam /
        ājñeti   sītāpariṇayaprārthanāya rāvaṇena preṣitaṃ tatpurohitaṃ	AjQeti   sItA pariNaya prArTanAya rAvaNena prezitam tat purohitam

   'pītyarthaḥ /	api iti arTaH /

        Locanā:	LocanA:
        (lo, ī) ājñā śaketi   druhiṇobrahmā /	(lo, I) AjQA Saka iti   druhiNaH brahmA /

   "divākarādrakṣati yo guhāsu līnaṃ divābhītamivāndhakāram /	"divAkarAt rakzati yaH guhAsu lInam divABItam iva anDakAram /

   śuddhaṃ nirālambapadāvalambaṃ tamātmacandraṃ pariśīlayāmi" //	SudDam nirAlamba pada avalambam tam Atma candram pariSIlayAmi" //

   iti pūrvoktamanusañjayati   apratītatvamiti /	iti pUrva uktam anusaQja yati    a pratIta tvam iti /

   satataṃ bhāvayāmi ityarthaḥ /	satatam BAvayAmi iti arTaH /

        anyacandrato vailakṣaṇyamāha  yukta iti /	anya candrataH vElakzaNyam Aha   yuktaH iti /
        kālābhaiḥ śarīraparigrahecchārūpābhiḥ kalābhiḥ dharmaiḥ viśiṣṭaḥ san	kAla ABEH SarIra parigraha it CA rUpABiH kalABiH DarmEH viSizwaH san

   rāmaśarīraparigrahe /	rAma SarIra parigrahe /
        anyacandrastu svīyaṣoḍaśāṃśarūpābhiḥ kalābhiryuktaḥ san	anya candraH tu svIya zoxaSa aMSa rUpABiH kalABiH yuktaH san
   tamasāmandhakāraṇāṃ kṣataye eva bhavati /	tamasAm anDa kAraNAm kzataye eva Bavati /
        tathā tābhiḥ kalābhaiḥ hīnaḥ sanneṣāṃ tamasāṃ kṣataye bhavati /	taTA tABiH kalA ABEH hInaH san= ezAm tamasAm kzataye Bavati /
        agṛhītaśarīratvena tādṛśamohābhāvāt, anyacandrastu kalāhīnaḥ san	agRhIta SarIra tvena tAdRSa moha aBAvAt, anya candraH tu kalA hInaH san
   tamovivṛddhye eva bhavati /	tamaH vivRdDye eva Bavati /
        tamonāśakakalābhāvena tasya tamo vṛddhīṃ prati yatsattve 'grimakṣaṇe	tamaH nASaka kalA BAvena tasya tamaH vRdDIm prati yat sattve agri makzaNe

        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:
        (vi, ṭha) prasādaguṇalakṣaṇamāha   cittamiti /	(vi, Wa) prasAda guNa lakzaNam Aha   cittam iti /

   yathā mama  	yaTA mama

   varṇapratyayaliṅgānāṃ prakṛtyoḥ padayorapi // VisSd_10.11 //	varNa pratyaya liFgAnAm prakRtyoH padayoH api // VisSd _10.11 //

        ityābhāṇakamanukaroti /	iti ABANakam anukaroti /

   kimaparāddhamabhidhādvayena /	kim aparAdDam aBiDA dvayena /
        nanvatraiva doṣanirūpaṇaprastāve sandigdhayorarthaśabdayorduṣṭatā,	nanu atra eva doza nirUpaNa prastAve sandigDayoH arTa SabdayoH duzwa tA,
   tat kathaṃ "yena dhvasta" ityādāvabhidhānasaṃśaye alaṅkāratvamapyucyate ?	tat kaTam "yena Dvasta" iti AdO= aBiDAna saMSaye alaFkAra tvam api ucyate ?
   "abalā acalā vā syuḥ"ityādau "āśīḥ paramparāṃvandyām" ityādau ca	"abalA acalAH vA syuH"iti AdO "ASIH paramparAMvandyAm" ityAdO ca
   doṣasthale sandehavaśena vivakṣitaikārthānirddhāraṇādativyagratayā'svādaṃ	doza sTale sandeha vaSena vivakzita eka arTa anirdDAraNAt ati vyagra tayA asvAdam

   vicchittarānukūlyamanubhavasiddham /	vicCitta rAnu kUlyam anuBava sidDam /

   prayuktasādhanaṃ sārvalaukikameva /	prayukta sADanam sArvalOkikam eva /

   taṃ haṭhādivākṛṣya tato bahiṣkaroti, iha tu dvayorarthayorekasya	tam haWAt iva AkRzya tatas bahizkaroti, iha tu dvayoH arTayoH ekasya
   buddhyāroheṇāpareṇārthena tannimittakāvyādāvapakarṣatvam /	budDi AroheNa apareNa arTena tad nimittaka avyAdO= apakarza tvam /

   kavitvavivakṣānubhavasākṣiketi rahasyam /	kavi tva vivakza anuBava sAkzikA iti rahasyam /
        evaṃ "vaurivaṃśadavānala" ityādau vaṃśaśabdāt vyañjanayā baudhitasya	evam "vOri vaMSa dava anala" ityAdO vaMSa SabdAt vyaQjanayA bODitasya
   veṇurūpārthasyaikānvayarūpeṇārthena "gaurvāhīka'; ityādau govahīkayoriva	veNu rUpArTasya eka anvaya rUpeNa arTena "gOrvAhIka a; ityAdO go vahIkayoH iva
   "mukhacandra'; ityādau mukhacandrayoriva tādātmyādrūpakam /	"muKa candra a; ityAdO muKa candrayoH iva tAdAtmyAt rUpakam /

        sa ca gavārtho mukhya iti tatra gauṇī lakṣaṇā /	sa ca gavArTaH muKyaH iti tatra gONI lakzaNA /
        iha ca veṇurūpārtho vyaṅgya iti kathaṃ mukhyārthabādhajīvitā	iha ca veNu rUpa arTaH vyaFgyaH iti kaTam muKya arTa bADa jIvitA
   lakṣaṇeti cet ? atraivaṃ saṅgatiḥ /	lakzaNa iti ced ? atra evam saFgatiH /

   ihaiva dvitīyaparicchede saṅketitārthanirūpaṇe pradarśitena nayena	iha eva dvitIya paricCede saFketita arTa nirUpaNe pradarSitena nayena
   jātimātrabodhanād abhidhāyāṃ viratāyāṃ vyaṅgyatvenābhyupagantavyayā vyakte	jAti mAtra boDanAt aBiDAyAm viratAyAm vyaFgya tvena aByupaganta vyayA vyakte

   veṇurūpārthasya yathāvyaktirūpavyaṅgyasya jātirūpavyaṅgyenāvinābhāvena	veNu rUpa arTasya yaTA vyakti rUpa vyaFgyasya jAti rUpa vyaFgyena AvinA aBAvena

        atra dvayorarthayośca prākaraṇikatve niyāmakaṃ nāsti /	atra dvayoH arTayoH ca prAkaraNika tve niyAmakam na asti /
        tathā ca vaktrā yadyekamevārthaṃ prakramyedaṃ padyamuktaṃ	taTA ca vaktrA yadi ekam eva arTam prakramya idam padyam uktam
   syāttadānyārthasya vyaṅgyatvena tulyayogitāyā atra prasaktyabhāvenāyameva	syAt tadA anya arTasya vyaFgya tvena tulyayogitAyAH atra prasakti aBAvena ayam eva
   tulyayogitālaṅkāraviviktaḥ śleṣasya viṣayaḥ syādityarthaḥ /	tulya yogita alaFkAra viviktaH Slezasya vizayaH syAt iti arTaH /
        naca tathāpi vyaṅgyopamālaṅkārasaṅkīrṇa evāyaṃ śleṣa iti vācyam,	na ca taTA api vyaFgya upama alaFkAra saFkIrNaH eva ayam SlezaH iti vAcyam,
   sambhavadavācyatākasyālaṅkārasya vyaṅgyatve alaṅkāratvābhāvāt kintu	samBavat avAcya tAkasya alaFkArasya vyaFgya tve alaFkAra tva aBAvAt kintu
   tadalaṅkāradhvanitvādeva kevalaṃ tatrālaṅkāravyapadeśo	tad alaFkAra Dvani tvAt eva kevalam tatra alaFkAra vyapadeSaH 
   brāhmaṇaśramaṇanyāyena vācyatādaśāyāmalaṅkāratvamādāya gauṇa eva /	brAhmaNa SramaNa nyAyena vAcya tAdaSAyAm alaFkAra tvam AdAya gONaH eva /
        samāsoktyaprastutapraśaṃsayostu vācyatāsambhavād vyaṅgyatve 'pi	samAsa uktya prastuta praSaMsayoH tu vA Acya tA samBavAt vyaFgya tve api
   alaṅkāratā, nanu mādhavomādhavayoḥ dvayārapi tulyavibhaktiviṣayatvena	alaFkAra tA, nanu mADavaH mADavayoH dvayAH api tulya viBakti vizaya tvena
   prākarāṇakatvamevetyato dvayārvācyatvenātra tulyayogitaivetyata	prAkarANaka tvam eva iti atas dvayAH vAcya tvena atra tulya yogi tA eva ityata
   āha   kiñceti /	Aha   kiQcA iti /
        ekasyaiva dharmasyeti /	ekasya eva Darmasya iti /
        na tu ekaśabdāvācyadharmadvayasyetyarthaḥ /	na tu eka Sabda avAcya Darma dvayasya iti arTaH /

        yena dhvastetyādāvityarthaḥ /	yena Dvasta iti AdO= iti arTaH /

   yattulyayogitā   pradarśanaṃ prākkṛtaṃtatparakīyamapapradarśanamātraṃ	yad tulya yogitA    pradarSanam prAk kRtaMtatparakIyam apapradarSana mAtram

   eṣo 'ṣṭadalapadmabandho digdaleṣu nirgamapraveśābhyāṃ śliṣṭavarṇaḥ, kintu	ezaH azwa dala padma banDaH diS dalezu nirgama praveSAByAm Slizwa varNaH, kintu

   evaṃ khaḍgabandhādikamapyūhyam /	evam Kaxga banDa Adikam api Uhyam /

   vācakatvam /	vAcaka tvam /

   sambhava iti vācyam /	samBavaH iti vAcyam /
        kyaṅantasyākarmakatvena karmabhūtasyātmanaḥ upameyasyātra	kyaFantasya akarmaka tvena karma BUtasya AtmanaH upameyasya atra
   prasaktyabhāvāt /	prasakti aBAvAt /
        nacetyāśaṅkyottasyati  uktadeveti /	naca iti ASaFkya uttasyati  uktadeva iti /

   upameyamātralope udāhṛtam, ācārasya sādhāraṇadharmatvānavadhānena tasyāpi	upameya mAtra lope udAhRtam, AcArasya sADAraNa Darma tvAnavaDAnena tasya api

        "vidvan mānasahaṃsa ! vairikamalāsaṅkocadīptadyute !	"vidvat mAnasa haMsa ! vEri kamala asaFkoca dIpta dyute !

   tādātmyāpratīteḥ /	tAdAtmya apratIteH /
        śleṣopapādakaviśakalitapratītau vcyarūpaṇāsaṅgatiḥ, tādavasthyāt /	Sleza upapAdaka viSakalita pratItO vcya rUpaNA saFgatiH, tAdavasTyAt /
        anyathā "vidvanmānasahaṃsa" ityādāvapi tathāprasaṅgaḥ syāt /	anyaTA "vidvat mAnasa haMsa" iti AdO= api taTA aprasaFgaH syAt /
        "ābhāti te kṣitibhṛtaḥ kṣaṇadānibheyaṃ	"a ABAti te kzitiBRtaH kzaNadA niBeyam
   nistriṃśamāṃsalatamālavanāntalekhā /	nistriMSa mAMsala tamAla vana anta leKA /
        indutviṣo yudhi haṭhena tavārikīrtti  rānīya yatra ramate	indu tvizaH yuDi haWena tavAri kIrtti rAnIya yatra ramate
   taruṇapratāpaḥ" //	taruNa pratApaH" //
        iha ekadeśavarttini rūpake kṣitibhṛd rājā eva kṣitibhṛt parvata iti	iha eka deSavarttini rUpake kzitiBRt rAjA eva kzitiBRt parvataH iti
   śliṣṭam /	Slizwam /
        tātrālaṅkārikacaṇḍidāsapaṇḍitādayaḥ rājani parvatatvāropaṇaṃ	tAtra alaFkArika caNxi dAsa paNxita AdayaH rAjani parvata tva AropaNam
   nistriṃśasya tamālavanatvāropaṇe heturiti śliṣṭaparimparitamādriyante /	nistriMSasya tamAlavana tva AropaNe hetuH iti Slizwa parimparitam Adriyante /

   mānasatvāde rājño haṃsatvādirūpaṇanimittamiva, nistriṃśasya	mAnasa tvAde rAjQaH haMsa tva Adi rUpaNa nimittam iva, nistriMSasya
   tamālavanatvarūpaṇopayogitvam /	tamAla vana tva rUpaNa upayogi tvam /

   pratāpakīrttyornāyikanāyikātvopakaraṇatvād iha prakṛtasūtroktaṃ	pratApa kIrttyoH nAyika nAyikA tva upakaraNa tvAt iha prakRta sUtra uktam
   śliṣṭaikadeśarūpyaṃ sāvayavaikadeśavivartirūpakameva bhāvituṃ yuktaṃ, natu	Slizwa eka deSa rUpyam sa avayava eka deSa vivarti rUpakam eva BAvitum yuktaM, na tu
   śliṣṭaparamparitamiti manyāmahe /	Slizwa paramparitam iti manyAmahe /

   mānasasya mānasatvāropaṇasādṛśyaṃ vināsiddham /	mAnasasya mAnasatva AropaNa sAdRSyam vinA asidDam /
        iha tu nistriṃśasya tamālavanāntatvaṃ nīlimādināpi prasiddham /	iha tu nistriMSasya tamAla vana anta tvam nIlim AdinA api prasidDam /
        kiñca sāvayave rūpake kvacidekaikasya	kiQca sa avayave rUpake kvacid ekEkasya
   sādṛśyāprasiddherapyekobhūyānyonyasāhāyyena sādṛśyapratītiḥ /	sAdRSya aprasidDeH api ekaH BUya anyonya sAhAyyena sAdRSya pratItiH /

        kevalaṃ mānasādipadeṣu ākṣipyamāṇaṃ sarovarādyartharūpaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ	kevalam mAnasa Adi padezu AkzipyamANam sarovara Adi arTa rUpam vyaFgyam
   haṃsatvādisādhakamātram /	haMsa tva Adi sADaka mAtram /

   bhātīti tamaso bahulībhāvāt haṭharamaṇopayogiteti prācyānāmapi vyākhyā /	BAti iti tamasaH bahulIBAvAt haWa ramaNa upayogi tA iti prAcyAnAm api vyAKyA /

   haṭharamaṇopakaraṇatvād yathoktameva jyāyaḥ /	haWa ramaNa upakaraNa tvAt yaToktam eva jyAyaH /
        "dyāmāliliṅga, mukhamāśudiśāṃ cucumba rūddhāmbaraḥ śaśikalāmalikhat	"dyAm Ali liFga, muKam ASudiSAm cucumba rUdDa ambaraH SaSi kalAma liKat
   karagraiḥ /	karagrEH /
        āntarnimagnacarapuṣpaśaro 'tipātā   tkiṃ kiṃ cakāra taruṇo	Antar nimagna cara puzpa SaraH atipAtA  tkim kim cakAra taruNaH 
   nayadīkṣaṇāgniḥ //	naya dIkzaNa agniH //

   prathamamabhidhāyā viśrāmād vyañjanayaiva yuvarūpor'thaḥ pratīyate /	praTamam aBiDAyAH viSrAmAt vyaQjanayA eva yuvarUpor aTaH pratIyate /
        iha tu kṣitibhṛta ityādau bahūnāṃ rūpaṇāt pratāpasya taruṇatvarūpaṇaṃ	iha tu kzitiBRtaH ityAdO bahUnAm rUpaNAt pratApasya taruNa tva rUpaNam
   śābdam /	SAbdam /
        itaśca ramata ityādipadānāṃ rūpakasādhakataiva, natu dyāmāliliṅga	itas ca ramataH ityAdi padAnAm rUpaka sADaka tA eva, na tu dyAma ali liFga
   ityādāvāliṅganādīnāmiva samāsoktisādhakatā /	iti AdO= AliFgana AdInAm iva samAsokti sADaka tA /

   lakṣyasyāprasiddheḥ /	lakzyasya aprasidDeH /

   kāryyasāmyabāhulyasamvalitatvam, tatraiva	kAryya sAmya bAhulya samvalita tvam, tatra eva

        ābhātītyādau ca vācyarūpaṇānāṃ bahutvena kāryyādisāmyaṃ svalpatayā	ABAti ityAdO ca vAcya rUpaNAnAm bahu tvena kAryI Adi sAmyam su alpa tayA
   tatsahāyyamevācarati iti /	tat sahAyyam eva Acarati iti /

   vyavahārasamāhopajīvitā samāsoktiḥ /	vyavahAra samAha upajIvitA samAsoktiH /

   kvacidvaidharmye 'pi yathā  	kvacid vEDarmye api yaTA

        ihāsambhṛtaṃ maṇḍanamityatra kecidāhurvibhāvanākhyo 'laṅkāra iti,	iha asamBRtam maNxanam iti atra kecid AhuH viBAvana AKyaH alaFkAraH iti,

   "kiṃ tāruṇyataroriyaṃ rasabhahodbhinnā navā vallarī velāprocchalitasya kiṃ	"kim tAruNyataroH iyam rasa Baha udBinnA navA vallarI velA procCalitasya kim

   krameṇodāharaṇam  	krameNa udAharaNam  
   "priya iti gopavadhūbhiḥ śiśuriti vṛddhairadhīśa iti devaiḥ /	"priyaH iti gopa vaDUBiH SiSuH iti vRdDEH aDISaH iti devEH /
   nārāyaṇa iti bhaktairbrahmetyagrāhi yogibhirdevaḥ" //	nArAyaNaH iti BaktEH brahma iti agrAhi yogiBiH devaH" //
        ************* COMMENTARY *************	************* SOMMENTa aRY *************

        tattadevāha  priya ityādi /	tat tat eva aha   priyaH ityAdi /

   atraikasyāpi bhagavatastattadguṇayogādanekadhollekhe gopavadhūprabhṛtīnāṃ	atra ekasya api BagavataH tad tad guNa yogAt anekaDA ulleKe gopa vaDU praBRtInAm
   rucyādayo yathāyogaṃ prayojakāḥ /	ruci AdayaH yaTAyogam prayojakAH /

   yadāhuḥ  	yat AhuH

   na cāyamabhede bheda ityevaṃrūpātiśayoktiḥ /	na ca ayam aBede BedaH iti evaMrUpa atiSayoktiH /

   kecidāhuḥ  "ayamalaṅkāro niyamenālaṅkārāntaravicchittimūlaḥ /	kecid AhuH  "ayam alaFkAraH niyamena alaFkAra antara vicCitti mUlaH /

   śrīkaṇṭhajanapadavarṇane  "vajrapañjaramiti śaraṇāgataiḥ, ambaravivaramiti	SrIkaNWa janapada varNa ne  " vajrapaQjaram iti SaraNa AgatEH, ambara vivaram iti

   prayoktṛpratipatroḥ saṃpratipattiḥ sa gauṇaḥ, sa ca bhedapratyayapuraḥ	prayoktR pratipatroH saMpratipattiH sa gONaH, sa ca Beda pratyaya puras

   evāmbaravivarādyāropa iti /	eva ambara vivara Adi AropaH iti /
        ************* COMMENTARY *************	************* SOMMENTa aRY *************
        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:
        (vi, ga) atiśayoktyasaṅkīrṇo 'pyullekhasya viṣayo 'stīti	(vi, ga) atiSaya ukti asaFkIrNaH api ulleKasya vizayaH asti iti
   darśayati   śrīkaṇṭheti /	darSayati   SrIkaNWa iti /
        śrīkaṇṭhanāmā rājaviśeṣaḥ tasya nagaraṃ śaraṇāgataiḥ śatruto bhītaiḥ	SrIkaNWa nAmA rAja viSezaH tasya nagaram SaraNa AgatEH SatrutaH BItEH

   lakṣaṇābhāvāt /	lakzaNa aBAvAt /

        "āropasya prāṅnirdeśe tu gauṇī lakṣaṇā, yathā gaurvāhīka ityatra /	"Aropasya prAk nirdeSe tu gONI lakzaNA, yaTA gOH vAhIkaH iti atra /

   ityarthaḥ /	iti arTaH /
        rūpakādītyādi śabdāt sādṛśyamūlakotprekṣādyanekālaṅkāraparigrahaḥ /	rUpaka Adi ityAdi SabdAt sAdRSya mUlaka utprekzA Adi aneka alaFkAra parigrahaH /

   tathātvābhāvapradarśanāya /	taTA tva aBAva pradarSanAya /
        paraśabda ityādi /	para SabdaH ityAdi /

   ityarthaḥ /	iti arTaH /
        sa ceti /	sa ca iti /

   phalotprekṣā yathā  	Pala utprekzA yaTA  
   "rāvaṇasyāpi rāmāsto bhittvā hṛdayamāśugaḥ /	"rAvaNasya api rAmAstaH BittvA hRdayam ASugaH /

   siddhatve 'dhyavasāyasyātiśayoktirnigadyate /	sidDa tve aDyavasAyasya atiSaya uktiH nigadyate /

   "kva sūryaprabhavo vaṃśaḥ kva cālpaviṣayā matiḥ /	"kva sUrya praBavaH vaMSaH kva ca alpa vizayA matiH /

   tatparasannidhereva doṣaḥ /	tad para sanniDeH eva dozaH /

   tatraikadeśavivartirūpakameva /	tatra eka deSa vivarti rUpakam eva /

        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:
        (vi, ba) nanu "panthia" ityādau yaḥ śabdaśaktimūlo	(vi, ba) nanu "panTia" ityAdO yaH Sabda Sakti mUlaH

   vācyārthastvaprastutaḥ /	vAcya arTaH tu aprastutaH /
        tathā ca tatrāprastutapraśaṃsātvamevāpatitamityatastato 'syā	taTA ca tatra aprastuta praSaMsA tvam eva Apatitam iti atas tatas asya a
   bhedamāha /	Bedam Aha /
        vastudhvanau tathā sthityanumatirvyaṅgyā /	vastu DvanO taTA sTiti anumatiH vyaFgyA /
        na tatra vācyasya vyavahārasya vyaṅgyapuruṣādau samāropasya	na tatra vAcyasya vyavahArasya vyaFgya puruza AdO samAropasya
   prāṇatvācca tatkārakatvādityarthaḥ /	prANa tvAt ca tad kAraka tvAt iti arTaH /
        atra ca śabdaśaktimūlādityupalakṣaṇam /	atra ca Sabda Sakti mUlAt iti upalakzaNam /
        "dṛṣṭiṃ he prativeśinī" tyādāvapi yadbhāvinakhakṣatagopanaṃ vyaṅgyam,	"dRzwim he prativeSinI" tyAdO= api yad BAvi naKa kzata gopanam vyaFgyam,
   tadapi vaktryā uddeśyatvena prastutam /	tat api vaktryAH uddeSya tvena prastutam /
        vācyor'tho 'prastutastatrāpyeva masyāḥ prasaktirevaṃ samādhānaṃ ca	vAcyor aTaH aprastutaH tatra api eva masyAH prasaktiH evam samADAnam ca

   nāstītyāha   upamādhvanāviti /	na asti iti Aha   upama aDvanO= iti /
        atra hyaprastuto vācyaḥ /	atra hi aprastutaH vAcyaH /

   daurātmyāddhuri dhūryo na yujyate /	dOrAtmyAt huri DUryaH na yujyate /

   sadasadyogo yathā  	sat asat yogaH yaTA  
   "śaśī divasadhūsaro galitayauvanā kāminī saro vigatavārijaṃ	"SaSI divasa DUsaraH galita yOvanA kAminI saraH vigata vAri jam
   mukhamanakṣaraṃ svākṛteḥ /	muKam anakzaram svAkRteH /
   prabhūrdhanaparāyaṇaḥ satatadurgataḥ sajjano nṛpāṅganagataḥ khalo manasi	praBUH Dana parAyaNaH satata durgataH sat janaH nRpa aFgana gataH KalaH manasi
   sapta śalyāni me" //	sapta SalyAni me" //
        ************* COMMENTARY *************	************* SOMMENTa aRY *************
        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:
        (vi, ka) śaśīti /	(vi, ka) SaSI iti /
        ete sapta dhūsaratvaviśiṣṭaśayyādayaḥ sapta manasi śalyānītyarthaḥ /	ete sapta DUsara tva viSizwa SayyA AdayaH sapta manasi SalyAni iti arTaH /
        anaucityadarśanena śalyavad duḥ khadāyitvāt /	anOcitya darSanena Salya vat duH Ka dAyi tvAt /
        teṣvanaucityaṃ darśayati   śaśīti /	tezu anOcityam darSayati   SaSIti /
        ujjvalamūrtestasya divasadhūsaratvamanucitam /	ujjvala mUrteH tasya divasa DUsara tvam anucitam /
        evaṃ galitayauvanāyāḥ kāmavattvaṃ kāminyā galitayauvanatvaṃ vā	evam galita yOvanAyAH kAmavat tvam kAminyA galita yOvana tvam vA
   anucitam /	anucitam /
        evaṃ saraso vārijaśūnyatvam /	evam sarasaH vArija SUnyatvam /
        śobhanākṛtermūrkhasyākṣareṇa vidyayā śūnyatvam /	SoBana AkRteH mUrKasya akzareNa vidyayA SUnya tvam /
        prabhordhanaparāyaṇatvaṃ, dhanaparāyaṇa janasya prabhutvaṃ vā /	praBoH Dana parAyaNa tvaM, Dana parAyaNa janasya praBu tvam vA /
        sajjanasya satatadurgatatvaṃ satatadurgatasya sajjanatvaṃ vā,	sat janasya satata durgata tvam satata durgatasya sat jana tvam vA,
   nṛpāṅgaṇa gatasya khalatvaṃ, khalasya nṛpāṅāgaṇagatatvaṃ vā	nRpa aFgaNa gatasya Kala tvan, Kalasya nRpa aFAgaNa gata tvam vA
   anucitāmityarthaḥ /	anucitAm iti arTaH /
        atra śocyānāṃ vidheyānāṃ sadasattvavaśāt sadasadyogaḥ /	atra SocyAnAm viDeyAnAm sat asattva vaSAt sat asat yogaH /
        tatra daivādhānadoṣeṇa śocyasya sattvaṃ svādhīnadoṣeṇa	tatra dEva ADAna dozeNa Socyasya sattvam svADIna dozeNa
   śocyasyāsattvam /	Socyasya asattvam /
        tatra śaśino dhūsaratvaṃ, kāminyā galitayauvanatvasya vidheyatvapakṣe	tatra SaSinaH DUsara tvaM, kAminyAH galita yOvana tvasya viDeya tva pakze
   galitayauvanātvaṃ, saraso vārijaśūnyatvaṃ, svākṛteranakṣaramūrkhatvaṃ,	galita yOvanA tvan, sarasaH vArija SUnya tvan, su AkRteH anakzara mUrKa tvaM,
   sajjanasya durgatatvaṃ tadaiva doṣāt śocyatvena śobhanam /	sat janasya durgata tvam tadA eva dozAt Socya tvena SoBanam /
        galitayauvanāyāṃ kāmavattvasya vidheyatvapakṣe vidheyasya tasya	galita yOvanAyAm kAmavat tvasya viDeya tva pakze viDeyasya tasya
   prabhordhanaparāyaṇasya dhanaparāyaṇe prabhutvasya vā, vidheyasya khale	praBoH Dana parAyaNasya Dana parAyaNe praBu tvasya vA, viDeyasya Kale
   nṛpāṅgaṇagatatvasya nṛpāṅgaṇagate khalatvasya vā bidheyasya svādhīnadoṣeṇa	nRpa aFgaNa gata tvasya nRpa aFgaNa gate Kala tvasya vA biDeyasya svADIna dozeNa
   śocyatvāda śobhanatvamiti vidheyānāmeva sadasattvam /	Socya tvAt a SoBana tvam iti viDeyAnAm eva sat asat tvam /

   iha kecidāhuḥ  "śaśiprabhṛtīnāṃ śobhanatvaṃ khalasyāśobhanatvaṃ ceti	iha kecid AhuH   "SaSi praBRtInAm SoBana tvam Kalasya aSoBana tvam ca iti

   bhedepyabhedāroparūpātiśayoktiriyam /	Beda Ipya BedAropa rUpa atiSaya uktiH iyam /
        natu rūpakaṃ rūpakādhikaraṇasya	na tu rUpakam rUpaka aDikaraNasya
   sevanasyānirdiṣṭatvāccaraṇārthakapādaśleṣādeva sevābodhāt /	sevanasya anirdizwa tvAt caraNa arTaka pAda SlezAt eva sevA boDAt /
        śleṣastajjñāpaka ityarthaḥ /	SlezaH tad jQApakaH iti arTaH /
        atiśayoktirapi vācyotprekṣāyā aṅgabhityāhaatiśayoktirapīti /	atiSayoktiH api vAcya utprekzAyAH aFga BityA ahaatiSayoktiH api iti /
        iyaṃ tu prakarṣakamaṅgaṃ sevājñānaṃ vinā	iyam tu prakarzakam aFgam sevA jQAnam vinA
   manthavyathopaśamanārthatāyāḥ veṣṭanamātrasyāsambhavenātprekṣāyāstathā	manTa vyaTA upaSamana arTa tAyAH vezwana mAtrasya asamBavenAt prekzAyAH taTA
   prakarṣaṇaāt /	prakarzaNaAt /
        natu jñāpakamaṅgam /	na tu jQApakam aFgam /

   janakamaṅgamutkaṭakoṭisaṃśayātmikāyā utprekṣāyāḥ sevājñānena ajananat /	janakam aFgam utkawa kowi saMSaya AtmikAyAH utprekzAyAH sevA jQAnena ajananat /

   ekāśrayānupraveśo yathā mama  	eka ASraya anupraveSaH yaTA mama  
   "kaṭākṣeṇāpīṣatkṣaṇamapi nirīkṣeta yadi sā tadānandaḥ sāndraḥ sphurati	"kawAkzeNa api Izat kzaNam api nirIkzeta yadi sA tadAnandaH sAndraH sPurati

        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:
